creator: PayMaya Philippines, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
PayMaya is a FREE e-wallet app that caters to your need for safe and contactless transactions. You can use the PayMaya app to buy load, send money, make bank transfers, pay bills, scan-to-pay via QR, and more. You also get a virtual prepaid card for shopping online and booking flights.

You can also get a PayMaya physical card that you can link to the app and use to pay in stores that accept credit and debit cards, or to withdraw at ATMs here and abroad.

With PayMaya, you can easily manage your finances, closely monitor your spending, enjoy great deals and even get cashback when you spend!

What is Balik Bayad?
PayMaya introduces Balik Bayad to communicate effectively the VALUE of secure and fast payments na laging may balik sa’yo. May balik na cashback at rewards, oras at convenience, discounts and special perks!

OPEN AN ACCOUNT IN A MINUTE
• No application forms needed
• Zero maintaining balance
• Get a pre-approved Visa or Mastercard card when you upgrade your account

PAY VIA QR
• #ScanToPay via QR at your favorite stores, restaurants, supermarkets, and more!

SAFE AND SECURE
• Real-time tracking of transactions
• Receive SMS alerts after every transaction
• Regulated by the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas

ACCESSIBLE ADD MONEY CHANNELS
• Easily pull funds from your debit and/or credit card to your PayMaya account
• Transfer your money from other mobile banking apps: BDO, BPI, Metrobank, Unionbank, etc.
• Top up at SM Business Centers, Robinsons Supermarket, Smart Padala outlets, Pay&Go kiosks, leading convenience stores, and more!

SHOP ONLINE WITHOUT A CREDIT CARD
• Gamitin ang iyong virtual card to pay for your shopping haul, flights, and hotel accommodations

PAY BILLS IN A FLASH
• Wag nang pumila and pay your bills anytime, anywhere

SEND MONEY TO FAMILY & FRIENDS
• Send allowance to your family
• Split the bill with friends easily

BUY LOAD
• Buy discounted load
• Send prepaid load to your barkada

GAMING PINS
• Purchase gaming pins in the shop

Join millions of other users who have made the switch to hassle-free, cashless transactions!

SEE LATEST PROMOS
Visit https://www.paymaya.com/deals

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

We’ve also made navigating the app much more convenient with a couple of changes to your dashboard. We included the regular bug fixes and improvements to this update, too!

As always, keep your app regularly updated and stay safe!

title: PayMaya - Shop online, pay bills, buy load & more!

creator: PayMaya Philippines, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
PayMaya is a FREE e-wallet app that caters to your need for safe and contactless transactions. You can use the PayMaya app to buy load, send money, make bank transfers, pay bills, scan-to-pay via QR, and more. You also get a virtual prepaid card for shopping online and booking flights.

You can also get a PayMaya physical card that you can link to the app and use to pay in stores that accept credit and debit cards, or to withdraw at ATMs here and abroad.

With PayMaya, you can easily manage your finances, closely monitor your spending, enjoy great deals and even get cashback when you spend!

What is Balik Bayad?
PayMaya introduces Balik Bayad to communicate effectively the VALUE of secure and fast payments na laging may balik sa’yo. May balik na cashback at rewards, oras at convenience, discounts and special perks!

OPEN AN ACCOUNT IN A MINUTE
• No application forms needed
• Zero maintaining balance
• Get a pre-approved Visa or Mastercard card when you upgrade your account

PAY VIA QR
• #ScanToPay via QR at your favorite stores, restaurants, supermarkets, and more!

SAFE AND SECURE
• Real-time tracking of transactions
• Receive SMS alerts after every transaction
• Regulated by the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas

ACCESSIBLE ADD MONEY CHANNELS
• Easily pull funds from your debit and/or credit card to your PayMaya account
• Transfer your money from other mobile banking apps: BDO, BPI, Metrobank, Unionbank, etc.
• Top up at SM Business Centers, Robinsons Supermarket, Smart Padala outlets, Pay&Go kiosks, leading convenience stores, and more!

SHOP ONLINE WITHOUT A CREDIT CARD
• Gamitin ang iyong virtual card to pay for your shopping haul, flights, and hotel accommodations

PAY BILLS IN A FLASH
• Wag nang pumila and pay your bills anytime, anywhere

SEND MONEY TO FAMILY & FRIENDS
• Send allowance to your family
• Split the bill with friends easily

BUY LOAD
• Buy discounted load
• Send prepaid load to your barkada

GAMING PINS
• Purchase gaming pins in the shop

Join millions of other users who have made the switch to hassle-free, cashless transactions!

SEE LATEST PROMOS
Visit https://www.paymaya.com/deals

PAYMAYA CARES
We'd love to hear what you think about our product so we can make it an even better experience for you! Just send us an email at support@paymaya.com

You can also get a PayMaya physical card that you can link to the app and use to pay in stores that accept credit and debit cards, or to withdraw at ATMs here and abroad.

With PayMaya, you can easily manage your finances, closely monitor your spending, enjoy great deals and even get cashback when you spend!

What is Balik Bayad?
PayMaya introduces Balik Bayad to communicate effectively the VALUE of secure and fast payments na laging may balik sa’yo. May balik na cashback at rewards, oras at convenience, discounts and special perks!

OPEN AN ACCOUNT IN A MINUTE
• No application forms needed
• Zero maintaining balance
• Get a pre-approved Visa or Mastercard card when you upgrade your account

PAY VIA QR

SAFE AND SECURE
• Real-time tracking of transactions

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
No tricks, just treats for this month’s update!

Your wish is our command! You wanted credit card billers? You got 'em! P.S. We now have more than 600 billers!

Cash In made smooth like butter by linking your bank account — now with more banks! We’re adding more to the list soon so follow us for the latest.

Do you use PayMaya to accept payments for your online store? Let your customers know you’re the real deal with a Verified Seller badge!

Bugs have been squished in this update!
Stay safe!

title: PayMaya - Shop online, pay bills, buy load & more!

creator: PayMaya Philippines, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
PayMaya is a free digital wallet for easy, reliable, and secure payments. We ran the numbers: we simply have better offerings and more ways for you to take care of your transactions online or in person. Take PayMaya for a spin and believe us when we say we’re Too Good To Be No. 2.

SIGN UP TODAY AND GET A JOINING BONUS
Register to PayMaya, cash in at least P100, and get up to 100% cashback when you buy load or gaming pins from PayMaya Shop on the app.
Up to P100 cashback for basic users, P200 cashback for upgraded users

CASH IN FOR FREE AT MORE THAN 50,000 CHANNELS
With PayMaya, you get to enjoy the widest network of FREE Cash In Channels nationwide such as BPI, Ministop and Smart Padala.

GET MORE CONTROL WITH REAL-TIME TRANSACTION UPDATES
Never miss an update on your transactions. With PayMaya, you can monitor your purchases and payments in real-time – no need to wait for 24 hours.

ENJOY MORE RELIABLE SERVICES WITH 99% UPTIME
PayMaya is an e-wallet app with less downtime and is available 99% of the time for all your transactions.

ACCESS MORE THAN 1,500 BILLERS AND LOAD ITEMS
You can conveniently pay for your monthly bills and buy load items for yourself or others all in one app.

SEND MONEY TO MORE THAN 30 MILLION USERS FOR FREE
Send money for allowance and assistance to your family and friends anywhere in the country with PayMaya's Send Money feature.

CLAIM MONEY FROM MORE THAN 55,000 SMART PADALA OUTLETS
Just use your PayMaya account to conveniently claim money from friends and family via Smart Padala agents nationwide.

Join the millions of other users who have made the switch to hassle-free, cashless transactions!
SEE LATEST PROMOS
Visit https://www.paymaya.com/deals
PAYMAYACARES
We'd love to hear what you think about our product so we can make it an even better experience for you! Just send us an email via support@paymaya.com
FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL

www.facebook.com/PayMayaCares
www.youtube.com/PayMayaOfficial
www.instagram.com/paymayaofficial
www.twitter.com/paymayaofficial
descriptionShort: PayMaya is a FREE e-wallet app for easier, more convenient and secure payments.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Scan to Pay with PayMaya made even stronger in partnership with QR PH!
Now, any merchant or store in the Philippines that accepts payments via QR PH can be paid with your PayMaya wallet.

Love using PayMaya to send money?
You'll love it even more when you send them with GIFs! Every app update comes with fixes and improvements to your PayMaya experience. Stay safe!

title: PayMaya - Shop online, pay bills, buy load & more!

creator: PayMaya Philippines, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
PayMaya is a free digital wallet for easy, reliable, and secure payments. We ran the numbers: we simply have better offerings and more ways for you to take care of your transactions online or in person. Take PayMaya for a spin and believe us when we say we’re Too Good To Be No. 2.​
​
SIGN UP TODAY AND GET A WELCOME REWARD​
Get 100% cashback* when you buy load or gaming pins on the app after you create a new PayMaya account and Cash In at least P100.​

CASH IN FOR FREE AT MORE THAN 90,000 TOUCHPOINTS​
Enjoy the biggest selection of free Cash In channels nationwide, including BPI, Ministop, Smart Padala, and more.​

SEND MONEY TO MORE THAN 38M PEOPLE FOR FREE​
Send some allowance, pay someone back, or give some ayuda to anyone in the country — and add a .gif for that personal touch!​

GET MORE CONTROL WITH REAL-TIME TRANSACTION UPDATES
Monitor your transactions with purchases and payments that update in an instant, not after 24 hours.​
​
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE FROM VERIFIED SELLERS​
A verified check next to a PayMaya seller’s name means they passed our thorough background and security review. Shop away!​

ENJOY MORE RELIABLE SERVICES WITH 99% UPTIME
Spend more time managing your transactions and finances with an app that’s online anytime you need it.

ACCESS MORE THAN 1,500 BILLERS AND LOAD ITEMS​ 
Pay your monthly bills and buy or gift load items without leaving the app.

CLAIM MONEY FROM MORE THAN 60,000 SMART PADALA TOUCHPOINTS
Drop by at any Smart Padala outlet nationwide to claim money sent by friends and family via PayMaya.

—

Catch our latest promos at paymaya.com/deals or follow @PayMayaOfficial on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube.

Got thoughts about your PayMaya experience? Get in touch at support@paymaya.com or visit facebook.com/PayMayaCares.

*Max. P100 cashback for basic users and P200 for upgraded users.

title: PayMaya - Shop online, pay bills, buy load & more!

creator: PayMaya Philippines, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
PayMaya is now Maya, your new all-in-one money app.

Save, spend, grow, and master your money — that’s everything you can do and plenty more with Maya. It’s got all the wallet features you’ve come to rely on everyday, with the addition of a super secure, high-interest bank that’ll take your money to the skies. And when you’re ready to give your money some extra muscle, start trading in crypto! Enjoy a beginner-friendly experience with ways for you to learn the tricks of the trade right from the app.

We’ve taken all things possible with your money and put them all in Maya. After all, it’s everything and a bank.

Already have a PayMaya account? Just log in to Maya as usual.

If you’re new to the app, creating an account is free, easy, and rewarding. Get a P20 voucher for signing up plus an extra P80 after completing your account and sending money for the first time. What’s more, complete account users can buy load up to P200 and get 100% back!

Maya’s savings and credit features are powered by Maya Bank, Inc., a digital banking entity licensed by the BSP. Deposits are insured by the PDIC up to P500,000 per depositor.
descriptionShort: Save with 6% interest, buy crypto for P1, get quick credit, and more with Maya.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing Maya, your new all-in-one money app! Be the first to experience Maya's biggest transformation to date. We're bringing you new features like Crypto, Credit, and Savings with up to 6% interest so that you can make the most out of your money!

Get ready for take-off — the full Maya experience is launching for everybody soon.

descriptionShort: Save with 6% interest, buy crypto for P1, get quick credit, and more with Maya.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Reach all your goals with Maya, your all-in-one money app. Hit your financial targets with our newest feature: Personal Goals! You can enjoy higher interest rates as you stay on track with your goals! We’ve also taken care of a few bugs so that you can continue to enjoy a smooth and hassle-free app experience.

title: Maya–Your all-in-one money app

creator: PayMaya Philippines, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
PayMaya is now Maya, your new all-in-one banking app. ​

Save, spend, grow, and master your money – that’s everything you can do and plenty more with Maya. BSP-licensed banking with a twist? You bet. Enjoy high interest rates credited to you everyday, so you can feel your money literally growing every 24 hours.​

All the wallet features you need to send money, pay your bills, and more are right here, too. Link a Maya card to your wallet so you can shop, dine, and withdraw anywhere in style. ​

When you’re ready to take your money to the moon, start trading with crypto! Learn to buy, sell, hold, and trade between coins in an ever-expanding portfolio with ways to learn the tricks of the trade right from the app.​

We’ve taken all things possible with your money and put them all in Maya. After all, it’s everything and a bank. ​

Already have a PayMaya account? Just log in to Maya as usual. ​

Signing up is free, easy, and rewarding. Get a P20 voucher for joining plus an extra P40 after your first-ever transaction with your completed account.​

​Powered by Maya Bank, Inc. Regulated by the BSP. Deposits are insured by PDIC up to P500,000 per depositor. ​
descriptionShort: Save with 6% interest, buy crypto for P1, get quick credit, and more with Maya.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Your interest, now served daily. In this update, the interest you earn with Maya Savings now gets credited to your account EVERYDAY. Plus, with InstaPay finally in Maya Savings, you can move your money with speed thanks to this highly requested feature. And as usual, you can always choose InstaPay for transfers with your Wallet.

Finally, Maya Crypto now allows you to manage your crypto portfolio by showing you your net gains and losses in pesos at a glance. Now off to the moon with you!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Usernames have arrived! With this update, you can finally ditch phone numbers when sending or receiving money and use usernames instead. Make it as unique or as personal as you’d like – it’s a name that’s 100% you.

Want to buy load but short on Wallet funds? Don't worry, select upgraded accounts can now use Maya Credit as a payment checkout option to buy load items from Maya Shop.

Plus, diversify your Crypto portfolio even further with the addition of crypto's cutest coin: Shiba Inu.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Did you know you can scan non-Maya QR codes? In this new update, every time you fire up the in-app camera to pay at your favorite store, you’ll see which bank and e-wallet QR codes work with Maya. And before you ask – yes, G ‘yan sa QR code nila. ;)

In addition, you can cash in from your Maya Savings directly from the cash in screen. From the Wallet dashboard, tap ‘Cash in’ and select ‘Maya Savings’ to start.

title: Maya – all-in-one digital bank

creator: Maya Philippines, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Save, spend, grow, and master your money – that’s everything you can do and more with Maya, your all-in-one digital bank.​

SAVE​
BSP-licensed banking with a twist? You bet. Enjoy high interest rates credited to you everyday, so you can feel your money literally growing every 24 hours.​​

BORROW​
You'll never be out of budget again with easy ways to get a loan from Maya. Use Maya Credit to borrow up to P18,000 for your essentials, get Pay in 4 so you can shop now and pay later, or take out a Personal Loan of up to P250,000 when you're ready for some big life upgrades.*​

PAY​
All the wallet features you need to send money, pay your bills, and more are right here, too. Link a Maya card to your wallet so you can shop, dine, and withdraw in over 200 destinations worldwide.​

INVEST​
You’ve got plenty of ways to explore your money's potential. Buy, sell, and trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other popular cryptocurrencies for as low as P1 or try Maya Funds and invest in world-famous companies for just P50.​

We’ve taken all things possible with your money and put them all in Maya. After all, it’s everything and a bank. ​
*Loans are subject to eligibility. Powered by Maya Bank, Inc. Regulated by the BSP. Deposits are insured by PDIC up to P500,000 per depositor. ​​

​
For concerns, contact us via call, email, or chat:​

Via call​
• (+632) 8845 7788​
• 1800 1084 57788 toll-free​
• *788 for free using Smart​

Via email​
• support@maya.ph (for wallet and payments)​
• support@mayabank.ph (for banking and loans)​

Via chat​
1. Go to your Profile on the app​
2. Tap ‘Chat with us’​
3. Choose a topic that you need help with​
4. If you need more help, you can select ‘Chat with an agent’ to talk to one of our representatives​

Know why it feels good to get banked with Maya? You can earn up to 14% interest p.a. every day, loan up to P250,000 instantly, use your Maya card worldwide, and scan any QR Ph to pay for anything.​

SAVE​
BSP-licensed banking with a twist? You bet. Enjoy up to 14% interest p.a. credited to you every day, so you can see your money literally growing every 24 hours.​

BORROW​
When you're ready for some big life upgrades, get a Personal Loan of up to P250,000 instantly or use Maya Easy Credit to borrow up to P18,000 and give your everyday budget a boost. Approval is subject to credit evaluation. See below for terms.*​

PAY​
All the wallet features you need to send money, pay your bills, and more are right here, too. Get a Maya card and use it worldwide or go to your favorite local shops and scan any QR Ph to pay conveniently.​

INVEST​
You’ve got plenty of ways to explore your money's potential. Buy, sell, and trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other popular cryptocurrencies for as low as P1 or try Maya Funds and invest in world-famous companies for just P50.​

*Loan Terms​
• Credit limit amount: P15,000 - P250,000​
• Monthly add-on interest rate: 0.77% - 2.57%​
• Monthly effective interest rate: 1.4% - 4.25%​
• Tenure: 6 - 24 months​
• Max. annual APR: 30.78%​
• Applicable DST and other fees: Waived​
• Late fee (daily) on overdue principal: 0.17%​​

Sample Computation​
• Loan amount: P25,000​
• Monthly add-on interest rate: 0.83%​
• Tenure: 6 months​
• DST/fees: P0​
• Monthly installment amount: P4,374.17​
• Total repayment amount: P26,239.19​
• Daily penalty: 0.17%​​

Maya is a proudly licensed bank regulated by the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas. Deposits are insured by PDIC up to P500,000 per depositor.​

​For concerns, go to your app and visit the Help Center in your profile. You may also call us from 8 AM to 7 PM daily:​
• (+632) 8845 7788​
• 1800 1084 57788 toll-free​
• *788 for free using Smart​

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Ever found yourself a few pesos short at checkout? The NEW Insta-fill feature can fix that! Whenever you don't have enough funds in your Wallet for a transaction, Insta-fill lets you cover the remaining amount with funds directly from your Maya Savings. You can use it when paying your bills, buying load, or paying via QR. Update now to get this new feature plus the usual bug fixes!

Need to adjust your credit card's spending limits fast? Just tap the brand-new Security Center widget. You can't miss it – we made it into a big, blue button on your credit card dashboard so you can access these settings quickly.​

We also recently added a freeze button that lets you temporarily disable your credit card to prevent any transactions from being made.​

​To access these new security options and other general fixes, update your Maya app today.
